ModelProperties.position_comment: Overwrite the position of the model.
ModelProperties.enableRockingAnimation_comment: Turn the rocking animation on or off
ModelProperties.enableExplodeAnimation_comment: Turn the exploding animation on or off
ModelProperties.rockingMaxAngle_comment: Value in degrees, it's converted to radians in the background

TooltipProperties.objectName_comment: The name of the 3D object that the circle will follow, it will follow the object's origin, so don't forget to set it.
TooltipProperties.textShowMode_comment: Is the text shown in the product page(Page) or in the 3D scene(Canvas)?
TooltipProperties.image_comment: The image to be shown alongside the text(for now only in Canvas mode)
TooltipProperties.circleSize_comment: The size if the tooltip circle
TooltipProperties.position_comment: The circle's position is dynamicaly set by the 'objectName' property in the background, but you can use the 'position' property to force a position if 'objectName' is not valid.
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectEnable_comment: The size if the tooltip circle
TooltipProperties.RotatingObjectScale_comment: The scale of the rotating object
TooltipProperties.axisOfRotation_comment: The axis in which the rotating object rotates
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectSpeedOfRotation_comment: The speed that the rotating object rotates
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectForcePositionOffset_commen: Adjust the position of the rotating object on screen, values between -1 and 1 (left to right, top to bottom).
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectFront_comment: The 'front' of the object for the object focusing feature
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectFocusPoint_comment: The point that the camera will transition to if the object is focused on(if circle is clicked)
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectFocusPointDistance_comment: The distance from the focus point, that the camera will transition to
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectCameraLooktAtPoint_comment: The point that the camera will rotate around and look at when the object is focused on
TooltipProperties.rotatingObjectCameraArchWidth_comment: How wide must the transition's curve be when the object is focused
